name: Mac and Cheese
description: Mac and Cheese is a classic American comfort food dish made with macaroni, cheddar cheese, butter, all-purpose flour, milk, salt, and pepper. The macaroni is cooked until al dente, then mixed with a creamy cheese sauce made from melted butter, flour, milk, and cheddar cheese. It's a hearty and delicious dish that is loved by both kids and adults.
